messages.title: Theresa May's Tories cannot win here
messages.content: They haven't won a council seat since 1981. A month ago in this Constituency you elected 10 Labour and 10 Lib Dem county councillors and no Conservatives.

messages.title: It's AMANDA or Corbyn's Labour on June 8th here!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Amanda Hopgood is in favour of protecting pensions.
Amanda Hopgood opposes the Tory dementia tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in the NHS & Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Amanda Hopgood proposes to invest in the National Health Service and Social Care.
Amanda Hopgood is against school cuts.
